content.rendered:
Pricing

Get started with a free $15 credit. Only pay for what you use when you’re ready to scale.
Our pay-as-you-go tiered pricing saves you money as your business grows.

PRICING FAQS: Learn more about the promotional credits, payment options, billing information, and more. >

Free Trial

$15
Credit
One-time credit
  • Complete audio and video API platform
  • New feature updates
  • Comprehensive documentation and sample apps
  • Secure environment
  • Save up to $300 per year
SIGN UP

Pay As You Go

$25
Credit
Monthly recurring*
  • Complete audio and video API platform
  • New feature updates
  • Comprehensive documentation and sample apps
  • Secure environment
  • Save up to $300 per year
SIGN UP

ENTERPRISE

Deep volume discounts
with committed use
  • Customized pricing
  • Priority support
  • Security & HIPAA compliance
  • Regional media zone capability
  • IP whitelisting
CONTACT US

*See pricing FAQs for additional details.

Communications and Streaming

Build and launch high-quality one-on-one or one-to-many web conferencing or streaming applications.
*Rates as shown are per participant per minute. Learn how to calculate usage.

Enterprise

As your usage grows, discounts grow

Access deep volume discounts with committed use. Talk to us about custom pricing that matches your needs.

CONTACT US

Pursuit of audio and
video perfection

Dolby has revolutionized the science of sight and sound through innovative research and engineering. Now with Dolby.io, you can experience that same Dolby magic in your application built with the learnings from decades of audio signal processing know-how, state-of-the-art deep learning, and communications technologies trusted by large service providers.

Create high-quality, immersive audio experiences that reduce fatigue and enhance intelligibility. Make your media content sound its best with premium cloud media services that easily plug into existing workflows. Enjoy secure, reliable, and scalable APIs you can trust and effortlessly go from prototype to production.

Enjoy up to $300
in credits per year

When you sign up for an account and become a pay-as-you-go user, you’ll automatically save $25 each month. To learn more about the promotional offer, see the FAQs section below.

Sign up to try now

FAQs


When does the one-time $15 credit and monthly $25 credit take effect?

Starting January 1, 2022, free trial users will receive a one-time $15 credit just for signing up. Existing free trial users with free trial minutes will transition to the one-time $15 credit. Pay-as-you-go customers will receive a promotional monthly $25 credit. The $25 recurring credit does not apply to Music Mastering.

Is there a Free plan?

Yes, all new account signups receive a one-time $15 credit. No credit card required to sign up. The one-time $15 credit is available automatically upon self-service signup. The one-time $15 credit expires after five months of account signup.

Will my unused monthly credits rollover?

Your one-time $15 credit will be available for a period of 5 months. The promotional monthly $25 credit will not rollover and any unused credit will expire at the end of each month.

How can I take advantage of the monthly $25 credit?

Users who sign up for an account and become a pay-as-you-go customer are eligible to receive a $25 credit every month. The credit is automatically applied at the end of your billing cycle. The $25 recurring credit does not apply to Music Mastering.

What will happen to my existing trial minutes?

Our existing minutes will be replaced with our new credit system. All current and new free trial customers will receive a one-time $15 credit. All pay-as-you-go customers are automatically enrolled in the $25 monthly free credit. Free trial customers can upgrade at any time to receive the monthly free credit. These credits grant you the freedom to apply your discount to qualifying Dolby.io products.

How is my usage calculated?

Usage is calculated based on the types of Communications or Media minutes used in a given month. For each minute used, you are charged the appropriate price per minute. If you have promotional credits available, they will be automatically applied. To learn more about calculating Communications usage, please visit our technical guide.

How do I get started?

Once you have signed up for your free account you will find your API key under the “Default App” section. To get familiar with our product features you can read about each under our products section. You can find integration overviews and quick start guides in our documentation.

Can I pay with a credit card?

Yes, for your convenience, pay-as-you-go customers can pay with a credit card.

Can I add multiple credit cards?

All users are able to add multiple accounts but will only be charged on the default account they have set. Whichever account is set as default on the billing date will be charged for the prior month’s usage.

What happens if I am currently on ACH payments?

You will either need to provide a credit card to keep on file or upgrade your plan to Enterprise. Contact sales to learn more about Enterprise plans.

Is tax included?

Taxes will be added and assessed based on the billing address on file.

How do I provide my Value Added Tax (VAT) ID?

We will be providing functionality to add your Value Added Tax (VAT) ID to your account dashboard. You will be notified by email when this feature is available.

What is the billing cycle start and end dates? Can I change it?

Billing cycle start and end dates reflect the month’s usage in which you are charged for each invoice. No, you are not able to adjust your billing cycle dates.

What is the difference between pay-as-you-go and enterprise accounts?

Pay-as-you-go customers are billed to the set rates defined on the pricing page. Enterprise customers typically have higher frequent usage and receive custom rates along with priority support for their needs. In order to become an Enterprise customer, please reach out and talk to one of the customer experience members.

How are you keeping financial information and the transaction secure?

We process all payments via Stripe, enabling leading industry methods to ensure all safety for our users’ data.

Have more questions? See our full list of FAQs. Learn more

Get started

Start building with audio and video APIs

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Get started for free Get started for free
Contact sales
